Class MineField

  • java.lang.Object
    • MineField
  • public class MineField
extends java.lang.Object
    MineField class is a 2d array that represents a field of mines

    msurmenok

        Create mine field and put mines in random cells

        width - number of columns
        numberOfMines - number of mines

      • calculateAdjacentMineNumbers

        public int calculateAdjacentMineNumbers​(int x,
                                        int y)
        Check out how many mines near the specific cell
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the cell
        y - y coordinate of the cell
        Returns:
        number of mines nearby

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell​(int x,
                    int y)
        Method to get a specific cell
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of returning cell
        y - y coordinate of returning cell
        Returns:
        return cell with x y coordinate
